fluid.tconstruct.blazing_blood.fluid_eff: A lángoló vér elfogadható folyadék a harchoz, de igazán fényforrásként ragyog.
fluid.tconstruct.powdered_snow.fluid_eff: A porhó hasznos folyadék a netherben való harchoz, plusz sebzést okoz a lángoló moboknak.
fluid.tconstruct.honey.fluid_effect: Isteni édes, és eltávolítja a méreganyagokat, mit ne szeretnénk a méz szürcsölésében?
fluid.tconstruct.beetroot_soup.fluid_eff: A céklaleves egy könnyen előállítható szürcsölhető ételopció.
fluid.tconstruct.mushroom_stew.fluid_eff: A gombaragu egy nagyon megfizethető levesopció a szürcsöléshez útközben.
fluid.tconstruct.rabbit_stew.fluid_effec: A nyúlpörkölt a legjobb folyékony étel, ideális a szürcsöléshez.
fluid.tconstruct.meat_soup.fluid_effect: Ne kérdezd, mi van a húslevesben; csak élvezd az ízét, amikor felszürcsölöd.
fluid.tconstruct.potion.fluid_effect: A bájitalok széles választékát kínálják a főzőállványokban készített hatásoknak. A bájitalokat ki lehet önteni tartályokból, hogy megtöltsék a szerszámokat.
fluid.tconstruct.earth_slime.fluid_effec: A földnyálka egy hordozható dugattyú, ideális egyszerű repülő szőnyegekhez. Nos, feltéve, hogy a téglák szőnyegnek számítanak.
fluid.tconstruct.sky_slime.fluid_effect: Az égnyálka egy hordozható dugattyú, ideális, ha a bázisod csak 1 blokknyira van attól, ahol lennie kell.
fluid.tconstruct.venom.fluid_effect: A méreg nagyon jól párosul a méregcsonttal-dal, a tipp a nevében van.
fluid.tconstruct.ichor.fluid_effect: A váladék egy fordított gravitációs folyadék, amely segít neked is a gravitáció megfordításában. Az út visszafelé való túlélése a te feladatod.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_clay.fluid_effec: Nagyszerű falak gyors építéséhez, vagy csak az agyag gyors szilárdulásához öntés nélkül.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_glass.fluid_effe: Az olvadt üveg gyorsan megszilárdulhat egy könnyen eltávolítható ablakba.
fluid.tconstruct.liquid_soul.fluid_effec: Liquid soul lets you greatly slow opponents, at least that is the hope.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_obsidian.fluid_e: Az olvadt obszidián egy nagyon nehezen eltávolítható eltömődéssé válik.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_emerald.fluid_ef: Az olvadt smaragd a választás a bányászathoz, amikor szükséged van gyengéd érintésre.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_quartz.fluid_eff: Az olvadt kvarc egy szerény bányászati folyadék, nem túl drága és nem túl erős.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_amethyst.fluid_e: Az olvadt ametiszt a legolcsóbb bányászati folyadék, de nem túl erős.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_diamond.fluid_ef: Az olvadt gyémánt lehetővé teszi, hogy maximalizáld az érceket, de megéri a folyadék költségét?
fluid.tconstruct.molten_ender.fluid_effe: A blokkok lerakása egy nyálkabotot egy építőpálcává változtat.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_iron.fluid_effec: Az olvadt vasat arra használják, hogy a közelben lévő tárgyakat magadhoz vonzad, bár szükség esetén hasznos lehet a harcban is.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_gold.fluid_effec: Az olvadt arany először fáj, majd visszagyógyít, többet, mint amennyit elveszítettél. Megéri? Rajtad áll.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_copper.fluid_eff: Az olvadt réz jó vészhelyzeti levegőforrás hosszú víz alatti utazásokhoz.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_cobalt.fluid_eff: A maradandó felhő belélegzése a legbiztonságosabb módja a kobalt olvadt kobalt használatának a sietség érdekében, vagy csak használd fegyverként.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_debris.fluid_eff: Az olvadt törmelék a legerősebb folyadék a bányászathoz, még az obszidián bányászatára is képes.
Néha igazán harcolni akarsz fantomok ellen, sok olvadt ametiszt bronz elfogyasztása segíthet ebben.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_rose_gold.fluid_: Az olvadt rózsaarany lehetővé teszi, hogy egy kis életerőt veszíts, de cserébe egy kis előnyt szerezz.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_pig_iron.fluid_e: Az olvadt nyersvas a legízletesebb az olvadt fémek között. Nem mintha nagy verseny lenne.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_manyullyn.fluid_: Az olvadt manyullyn a legnagyobb sebzési potenciállal rendelkezik a nyers sebzés és a sebzési idő között.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_hepatizon.fluid_: Az olvadt korinthoszi bronz a legjobb védelemhez vagy harchoz? Mindkettő kockázatos de kifizetődő lehet.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_netherite.fluid_: Az olvadt netherit a legmagasabb alap sebzés, amikor nem várhatod meg, hogy a célpontod kivérezzen.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_tin.fluid_effect: Azt mondják, hogy a sárgarépa jó a szemnek, de az olvadt ón még jobb.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_aluminum.fluid_e: Az olvadt alumínium olyan, mint a tej, de agresszív. Ideális harc esetén, amikor az ellenfeleknek túl sok hatásuk van.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_lead.fluid_effec: Az olvadt ólom ad egy kis extra lökést a támadásaidhoz, ha hajlandó vagy várni.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_silver.fluid_eff: Az olvadt ezüst eltávolítja a méreganyagokat anélkül, hogy eltávolítaná a hasznos hatásokat.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_nickel.fluid_eff: Az olvadt nikkel lehetővé teszi, hogy károsítsd az ellenfeleidet, és csökkentsd a visszatámadás kockázatát, miért ne szeretnéd?
fluid.tconstruct.molten_zinc.fluid_effec: Az olvadt cink talán nem a legjobb választás a sebesség növelésére, talán a sebesség zavarhatja az ellenfelet.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_platinum.fluid_e: Nem vagyok biztos az olvadt platina alkalmazásában, hogy lassítsa az ellenfelek bányászati sebességét, de valószínűleg találsz rá okot.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_tungsten.fluid_e: Az olvadt volfrám az egyik legnehezebb fém, remélhetőleg megállítja az ellenségeidet.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_osmium.fluid_eff: Az olvadt ozmium az ellenségeidet mozdulatlanná teszi egy ütésr erejéig.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_uranium.fluid_ef: Az olvadt urán radioaktív bomlásaa nem biztonságos a környezetre, így öntsd az ellenségeidre.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_bronze.fluid_eff: Az olvadt bronz a tökéletes sötétbarna ital, amikor ébren kell maradnod és el kell kerülnöd a fantomokat.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_brass.fluid_effe: Az olvadt sárgaréz segít ellenállni a hőnek, és a második korty ingyenes, ha jól időzíted.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_electrum.fluid_e: Az olvadt elektrum nagyszerű, ha gyorsan kell bányászni, de nem akarsz sokat költeni.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_invar.fluid_effe: Az olvadt invar hasznos lehet, ha megpróbálod megenni azt a hatalmas tortát, de egyébként furcsa folyadék.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_constantan.fluid: Az olvadt konstantán hasznos lehet emberi ellenfelek ellen, de nem annyira a szörnyek ellen.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_pewter.fluid_eff: Molten pewter is probably lower risk than venom to boost your strength, but not by much.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_steel.fluid_effe: Molten steel lets you clear out enemies around you, or spread out bunched up enemies.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_enderium.fluid_e: Molten enderium is ideal as a weapon, keeping enemies from teleporting as you fight.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_lumium.fluid_eff: Molten lumium is either used to keep your eye on the target or make a quick but obvious escape.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_refined_glowston: Molten refined glowstone is great for tracking targets without sacrificing much damage.
fluid.tconstruct.molten_refined_obsidian: Molten refined obsidian maximizes damage against armored targets.
item.tconstruct.quartz_shuriken.tooltip: A throwable weapon with higher damage
item.tconstruct.flint_shuriken.tooltip: A throwable weapon with high knockback
item.tconstruct.piggy_backpack.tooltip: Use on a mob to pick it up
_comment_on_format_: These format allows you to have more control over separators in material names. By default we separate with space. You can use %1$s and %2$s if you wish to change the order.
item.tconstruct.dummy_tool_part.tooltip: Használható öntőformák készítéséhez, nem használható eszközök készítéséhez.
item.tconstruct.repair_kit.tooltip: Használd egy eszközön a táskádban, hogy megjavítsd. Ekvivalens %s rúddal
item.tconstruct.pickaxe.description:
A csákány egy precíz bányászati eszköz. Hatékony a kő és a fémek ellen.
Töri blokkokat, OK?
item.tconstruct.sledge_hammer.descriptio:
A pöröly egy széles bányászati eszköz. Széles körben bányászik blokkokat.
Hatékony az élőhalottak ellen.
item.tconstruct.vein_hammer.description: Az érkalapács egy széles bányászati eszköz. Sok összekapcsolt blokkot bányászik ki, tökéletes az ércekhez.
item.tconstruct.mattock.description:
A bontócsákány egy sokoldalú mezőgazdasági eszköz. Hatékony a fák, a föld, a homok, a kavics és a növények ellen.
Csak ne ásd ki a sírodat!
item.tconstruct.pickadze.description: A Pickadze egy sokoldalú bányászati eszköz. Hatékony a kő, a föld, a homok és a kavics ellen, de nem elég éles a keményebb kőblokkokhoz, mint a legtöbb érc.
item.tconstruct.excavator.description:
A kotró egy széles körű ásóeszköz. Nagy területeket ás fel a földben és a hóban.
Tereprendezés!
item.tconstruct.hand_axe.description:
The Hand Axe chops up wood and makes short work of leaves. It also makes for an effective weapon.
Chop chop!
item.tconstruct.broad_axe.description:
The Broad Axe fells small trees in a single swing, and makes quick work of large trees. It makes for a powerful heavy weapon.
Timber!
item.tconstruct.kama.description:
The Kama is a precision reaping tool, mowing down plants and shearing animals.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.scythe.description:
The Scythe is a broad reaping tool, mowing down plants in a wide area.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.dagger.description: The Dagger is a light weapon, capable of quick strikes from either hand.
item.tconstruct.sword.description:
A kard egy univerzális fegyver. A támadások távol tartják az ellenséges hordákat.
Jó a pókhálók ellen is!
item.tconstruct.cleaver.description: The Cleaver is a weapon for a smeltery master. High range attacks keep cut through the toughest of foes.
item.tconstruct.crossbow.description: The Crossbow is a light ranged weapon, capable of quickly firing arrows and fireworks.
item.tconstruct.longbow.description: The Longbow is a broad ranged weapon, capable of firing arrows with precision over long distances.
gui.tconstruct.plate_armor.description: A bevont páncél egy nagyon védelmes páncélkészlet korlátozott képességű helyekkel.

material.tconstruct.bamboo.armor: Movement penalty when using the shield is reduced by 10%

material.tconstruct.flint.flavor: This will spark the flames of a Tinker's heart!
material.tconstruct.flint.encyclopedia: Increases damage by a quarter of the square root of the trait level times lost durability
material.tconstruct.bone.flavor: I am the bone of my sword

material.tconstruct.bone.ranged: Increases melee damage by 0.5 and grants 1 armor pierce per level
material.tconstruct.bone.skull_encyclope: Grants resistance for 1 minute after drinking milk
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.flavor: Do you have a bone to pick with me?
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.encycl: Heals a percentage of damage dealt from critical hits
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.ranged: Heals a percentage of damage dealt from successful arrow hits
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.skull_: Melee attacks cause withering. After drinking milk the effect becomes faster
material.tconstruct.chorus.flavor: Not just the endermen, but the enderwomen, and the enderchildren
material.tconstruct.chorus.encyclopedia: Prevents the target from teleporting for a 5 seconds per effect level
material.tconstruct.chorus.ranged: Prevents the target from teleporting for a 5 seconds per effect level and allows damaging endermen with arrows
material.tconstruct.chorus.armor: Has a 25% chance per level of randomly teleporting attackers away
material.tconstruct.string.encyclopedia: Allows the tool to be repaired using string in the tinker station or crafting table
material.tconstruct.string.skull_flavor: Spiders are a master of potions, maybe their secret can help me enhance potions...
material.tconstruct.string.skull_encyclo: Causes positive potion effects to last 25% longer
material.tconstruct.leather.flavor: Killed a cow, tanned it's hide.
material.tconstruct.leather.encyclopedia: Prevents the tool from taking more than 1 damage in an action
material.tconstruct.vine.flavor: Keeps living, unlike the social network.
material.tconstruct.vine.encyclopedia: Tool has up to a 75% chance to resist damage in full sunlight
material.tconstruct.iron.flavor: Ironic. He could save others from death, but not himself.
material.tconstruct.iron.encyclopedia: Causes mining blocks and hitting mobs to attract nearby items.
material.tconstruct.iron.ranged: Causes firing arrows to attract nearby items to the holder.
material.tconstruct.iron.armor: Reduces damage from projectiles by 10% per level, and grants 5% knockback resistance times the max level.
material.tconstruct.iron.skull_encyclope: Melee attacks copy all negative status effects from the wearer to the target
material.tconstruct.seared_stone.encyclo: Gives +6 mining speed against blocks that can be melted in a melter
material.tconstruct.seared_stone.armor: Reduces damage from fire by 10% per level, and reduces fire burn time
material.tconstruct.scorched_stone.encyc: Gives +2 damage per level against burning targets
material.tconstruct.scorched_stone.armor: Reduces damage from fire immune mobs by 5% per level, and reduces fire burn time
material.tconstruct.copper.flavor: Don't let this tarnish your day.
material.tconstruct.copper.encyclopedia: Grants bonus mining speed at lower depth, +6 per 64 blocks below 64
material.tconstruct.copper.ranged: Grants bonus velocity at lower depth, +0.05 per 64 blocks below 64
material.tconstruct.copper.armor: Grants bonus protection at lower depth, +5% per 64 blocks below 64
material.tconstruct.copper.skull_flavor: Knocks the wind right out of them
material.tconstruct.copper.skull_encyclo: Melee attacks steal 3 seconds of air from the target
material.tconstruct.slimewood.flavor: Is this the wood of a slime or slime that's been infused with wood?
material.tconstruct.slimewood.encycloped: Gives a 5% chance per level of regenerating overslime each second
material.tconstruct.venombone.flavor: Become the bane of your enemies

material.tconstruct.venombone.ranged: Boosts drawspeed when poisoned by 0.05 plus 0.1 per level of poison
material.tconstruct.venombone.skull_ency: Projectiles cause slowness to the target. After drinking milk, melee attacks cause slowness and the level is stronger.
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.flavor: Disclaimer: Not actually made with roses.
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.encycloped: Grants 1 extra upgrade slot per part
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.skull_flav: Putting that arm shield to good use
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.skull_ency: Boosts health by 1 heart, plus an additional heart per piece of golden armor.
material.tconstruct.skyslime_vine.flavor: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
material.tconstruct.skyslime_vine.encycl: Cancels out the mining speed reduction when not on the ground
material.tconstruct.skyslime_vine.ranged: Grants +0.5 accuracy when not on the ground or a ladder
material.tconstruct.slimesteel.flavor: You must steal the slime to get slimesteel.
material.tconstruct.slimesteel.encyclope: Grants 25 extra overslime, +50% of the total per level
material.tconstruct.nahuatl.flavor: This is not an obsidian part, if it was it would say "Obsidian."
material.tconstruct.nahuatl.encyclopedia: Has a 50% chance of doing up to 5 damage over time, more damage at higher levels
material.tconstruct.nahuatl.armor: Has a 25% chance per level of doing up to 5 damage over time
material.tconstruct.amethyst_bronze.flav: Not to be confused with bronze.

material.tconstruct.amethyst_bronze.rang: Adds +0.1 velocity per level at the cost of limiting arrow angles to 32, 16, or 8 directions at the first 3 levels respectively

material.tconstruct.pig_iron.flavor: The absolute best material, no debates.
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.encyclopedi: Can be eaten to restore 1 hunger per level at 0.6 saturation
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.armor: Grants a 15% chance per level of eating the armor for 1 hunger per level at 0.6 saturation
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.skull_flavo: You won't like me when I'm angry!
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.skull_encyc: Grants 15 seconds of strength when damaged by another mob
material.tconstruct.darkthread.flavor: Come to the dark side, we have sowing
material.tconstruct.darkthread.encyclope: Increases drop chances from mobs, stacking with luck
material.tconstruct.darkthread.ranged: Increases drop chances from mobs killed by arrows
material.tconstruct.darkthread.skull_fla: Perfect for battles of wits, when you have to decide and drink to find out who is right.
material.tconstruct.darkthread.skull_enc: Makes the wearer immune to poison, though will not remove existing poison
material.tconstruct.cobalt.flavor: Coblat. The material of the vörös Army.
material.tconstruct.cobalt.encyclopedia: Boosts mining and attack speed by 7% per level
material.tconstruct.cobalt.ranged: Boosts drawspeed and velocity by 5% per level
material.tconstruct.cobalt.armor: Reduces damage from melee attacks by 10% per level, and boosts movement speed when using items by 5% per max level
material.tconstruct.manyullyn.flavor: The metal that most Tinkers will never pronounce right. Also known as a star cutting material.

material.tconstruct.manyullyn.armor: Temporarily boosts melee damage by 1 after taking damage, capping at the total level across all armor
material.tconstruct.hepatizon.flavor: He-pa-ti-zon - boil it, mash it, put it in a stew.

material.tconstruct.hepatizon.ranged: Boosts drawspeed by up to 25% per level, linearly increasing while firing 16 consecutive arrows

material.tconstruct.queens_slime.flavor: Princesses are evil, get yourself a Queen.
material.tconstruct.queens_slime.encyclo: Reduces durability by 15% per level, 66% of that going towards overslime
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.flavor: Harness the full power of the Nether Fortress - bone and blaze

material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.ranged: Grants +1% arrow damage per second of fire, up to +15% from lava's 15 seconds. Bonus reduced by fire resistance.
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.skull_f: I told them this is technically firespit, not firebreath, but apparently I don't get to decide the names for things I invent
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.skull_e: Allows spitting firecharges from the inventory as fireballs. Has a cooldown of 5 seconds and does not work underwater
material.tconstruct.blazewood.encycloped: Grants +0.5% protection against non-fire damage per second of fire, up to +7.5% from lava's 15 seconds. Bonus reduced by fire resistance.
material.tconstruct.ancient_hide.flavor: Leather tanned by the oldest of stone
material.tconstruct.ancient_hide.encyclo: Increases drop chances from blocks, stacking with luck
material.tconstruct.enderslime_vine.ency: Teleports the holder to the location of mined blocks or swaps the holder with attacked monsters
material.tconstruct.enderslime_vine.rang: Teleports the holder to the location of arrows that land in blocks or swaps the holder with monsters hit by arrows
material.tconstruct.glass.skull_flavor: Whose nice things are being destroyed now, creeper?
material.tconstruct.glass.skull_encyclop: Holding the helmet interact key while sneaking causes the wearer to explode
material.tconstruct.ender_pearl.skull_fl: Endermen know how to stay away from harm, and scientists. They have been ignoring my interview requests for weeks!
material.tconstruct.ender_pearl.skull_en: Teleports automatically when attacked by a projectile, and randomly from melee. Has a 15 second cooldown
material.tconstruct.rotten_flesh.skull_e: Melee attacks increase the targets fire time based on the wearer's fire time
material.tconstruct.gold.armor: Grants 10% protection per level against magic damage and reduces the time of negative potion effects. Also makes piglins friendly.
material.tconstruct.gold.skull_encyclope: Causes some gold ores to drop extra gold nuggets, and increases drop chance of gold armor by 4%. Nuggets and armor drops are further boosted by each piece of golden armor worn.
material.tconstruct.obsidian.flavor: This is an obsidian part, if it was not it would not say "Obsidian."
material.tconstruct.obsidian.armor: Grants 10% protection per level against explosions, and reduces explosion knockback
material.tconstruct.osmium.flavor: Túl sűrű, hogy megértse a vicceket
material.tconstruct.osmium.encyclopedia: Megakadályozza a sebzés 33%-át az első szinten, de 25%-kal növeli a javítási költséget
material.tconstruct.tungsten.flavor: Gondoltál már arra, hogy alapíts egy heavy metal bandát?

material.tconstruct.tungsten.ranged: Grants +15% draw speed and -10% movement speed per level
material.tconstruct.tungsten.armor: Grants +2 toughness and -10% movement speed per level

material.tconstruct.lead.flavor: Could try and make a sandwich out of this.
material.tconstruct.lead.encyclopedia: Grants +15% attack and -10% movement speed per level
material.tconstruct.lead.ranged: Grants +10% projectile power and -10% movement speed per level
material.tconstruct.lead.armor: Grants +15% knockback resistance and -10% movement speed per level
material.tconstruct.silver.flavor: You know, this tool isn't going to look so shiny in a few days.
material.tconstruct.silver.encyclopedia: Gives +2 damage against undead per level
material.tconstruct.silver.ranged: Gives +0.5 projectile power against undead per level
material.tconstruct.silver.armor: Reduces damage from undead by 5% per level
material.tconstruct.whitestone.flavor: Take your useless white metals or rocks and make a useful tool
material.tconstruct.whitestone.encyclope: Mining stone has a 20% per level of granting +3 stoneshield
material.tconstruct.aluminum.ranged: Grants +7% drawspeed and accuracy at the cost of 5% loss of protection
material.tconstruct.aluminum.armor: Grants +5% use item speed at the cost of 5% loss of protection
material.tconstruct.steel.encyclopedia: Grants +10% durability and melee damage per level
material.tconstruct.steel.ranged: Grants +10% durability and +5% projectile power per level
material.tconstruct.steel.armor: Grants +10% durability and +1 toughness per level
material.tconstruct.bronze.flavor: Not to be confused with amethyst bronze.
material.tconstruct.bronze.encyclopedia: Grants +6 mining speed per level at full durability, 0 boost below 50% durability
material.tconstruct.bronze.ranged: Grants +0.05 velocity per level at full durability, 0 boost below 50% durability
material.tconstruct.bronze.armor: Boosts toughness by 2 per level when at full durability, but boost drops to 0 below 50% durability
material.tconstruct.constantan.flavor: Constantantantantantantan... Sorry it's fun to add more "tans."
material.tconstruct.constantan.encyclope: Grants +7.5 mining speed in extreme cold and twice reinforced in extreme heat
material.tconstruct.constantan.ranged: Grants +0.15 velocity in extreme cold and twice reinforced in extreme heat
material.tconstruct.constantan.armor: Grants 5% protection in extreme cold and twice reinforced in extreme heat
material.tconstruct.invar.encyclopedia: Grants +1.6 damage in biomes with neutral temperatures
material.tconstruct.invar.ranged: Grants +0.15 accuracy in biomes with neutral temperatures
material.tconstruct.invar.armor: Reduces damage by 5% per level in biomes with neutral temperatures
material.tconstruct.electrum.encyclopedi: Grants +25% XP per level from blocks and monsters
material.tconstruct.electrum.ranged: Grants +25% XP per level from monsters killed by arrows
material.tconstruct.necronium.flavor: This much decay probably only leaves it with a quarter life
material.tconstruct.necronium.encycloped: Causes at least 5 seconds of wither, to your target and at a 25% chance to you
material.tconstruct.plated_slimewood.fla: All the shininess of brass with the squish of slime
material.tconstruct.plated_slimewood.enc: Grants +100% to all methods of restoring overslime
modifier.tconstruct.empty.description: Fallback for when a modifier is missing
modifier.tconstruct.shiny.description: Tool glows with an enchanted glint
modifier.tconstruct.farsighted.descripti: Decreases the field of vision while equipped

modifier.tconstruct.reinforced.descripti: Tool is less likely to take damage
modifier.tconstruct.overforced.descripti: Tool is reinforced using slime, allowing more capacity for overslime
modifier.tconstruct.emerald.flavor: Villagers will want to be you!
modifier.tconstruct.emerald.description: Increases durability depending on base durability! Boosts effectiveness of conditional damage and mining speed

modifier.tconstruct.experienced.descript: Gain bonus XP from killing mobs and mining blocks

modifier.tconstruct.blasting.description: Your tool breaks blocks weak to explosions, such as ores, faster!
modifier.tconstruct.hydraulic.descriptio: Tool mines faster underwater or in the rain!
modifier.tconstruct.lightspeed.descripti: Tool mines well lit blocks faster! Boots move faster in the light!
modifier.tconstruct.knockback.descriptio: Hitting things in melee makes them go flying further!
modifier.tconstruct.padded.description: Reduces the knockback of the tool, to stop your enemies from escaping
modifier.tconstruct.severing.flavor: Not just the heads, but the feet, and the feathers!

modifier.tconstruct.fiery.flavor: Infused with the fires of hell!
modifier.tconstruct.fiery.description: Ignites targets of melee attacks, fired arrows, and counterattacks
modifier.tconstruct.necrotic.description: Critical hits on enemies drains their life to heal you
modifier.tconstruct.piercing.description: Tool deals bonus damage which attacks through armor!
modifier.tconstruct.pierce.description: Attacks cancels out some of the target's armor!
modifier.tconstruct.smite.description: Undead fear the might of the melon!
modifier.tconstruct.bane_of_sssss.flavor: That'sss a nice ssspider you have there!
modifier.tconstruct.bane_of_sssss.descri: Tool does bonus damage against spiders, creepers and other creepey crawly hissing things!
modifier.tconstruct.antiaquatic.descript: Tool does bonus damage to sea creatures!
modifier.tconstruct.killager.description: Increases damage against villagers, illagers, and other longnosed creatures!
modifier.tconstruct.cooling.description: Tool does bonus damage to fire based creatures!
modifier.tconstruct.sweeping_edge.descri: Targets of sweep attack take a larger percentage of this tool's damage
modifier.tconstruct.sharpness.descriptio: Tool is so much sharper, dealing more damage!
modifier.tconstruct.swiftstrike.descript: Magic purple gems make the weapon lighter and easier to swing!
modifier.tconstruct.power.flavor: The power within becomes the power without
modifier.tconstruct.quick_charge.flavor: For when you are tired of all the extra fees
modifier.tconstruct.impaling.flavor: Just keeps on going and going and going
modifier.tconstruct.impaling.description: Arrows keep moving after hitting a target, potentially hitting more targets
modifier.tconstruct.trueshot.flavor: This bow will always aim true
modifier.tconstruct.trueshot.description: Increases the accuracy of the weapon
modifier.tconstruct.blindshot.flavor: Gonna put some dirt in your eye
modifier.tconstruct.blindshot.descriptio: Decreases the accuracy of the weapon
modifier.tconstruct.freezing.description: Causes melee attacks, fired arrows, and counterattacks to freeze the target

modifier.tconstruct.multishot.descriptio: Allows shooting multiple arrows at once
modifier.tconstruct.sinistral.flavor: It sounds evil, but I assure you its a perfectly natural condition

modifier.tconstruct.scope.flavor: 360 with scope does not sound as cool
modifier.tconstruct.scope.description: Zoom in on the target when charging the bow.
modifier.tconstruct.knockback_resistance: Anvils are heavy, so it should keep you from being knocked back, right?
modifier.tconstruct.golden.description: Gives your armor extra golden bling, adds another option for repair and piglins love it!
modifier.tconstruct.ricochet.description: Bounce away further when attacked, for effective escapes
modifier.tconstruct.revitalizing.descrip: Strengthens the heart, granting more hearts
modifier.tconstruct.embellishment.descri: Armor appearance changed to match a different material
modifier.tconstruct.dyed.description: Armor appearance changed to match a different material
modifier.tconstruct.trim.description: Additional armor detailing using expensive patterns
modifier.tconstruct.protection.descripti: Increases protection to all damage types
modifier.tconstruct.melee_protection.des: Increases protection against direct physical damage
modifier.tconstruct.fire_protection.desc: Protects against damage from fire and reduces fire time
modifier.tconstruct.scorch_protection.de: Protects against damage from fire immune mobs and reduces fire time
modifier.tconstruct.blast_protection.des: Protects against explosion damage and reduces knockback from explosions
modifier.tconstruct.magic_protection.des: Protects against damage from magical sources
modifier.tconstruct.turtle_shell.flavor: Tortoises go on land, turtles in the sea
modifier.tconstruct.turtle_shell.descrip: Increases protection underwater, along with swim speed
modifier.tconstruct.dragonborn.descripti: Increases protection and attack when airborne
modifier.tconstruct.shulking.description: Increases resistance while sneaking, but also decreases damage
modifier.tconstruct.boundless.descriptio: Increases the maximum percentage of protection from any source
modifier.tconstruct.thorns.description: Harness the power of the guardian, causing attackers to sometimes take damage
modifier.tconstruct.sticky.description: Attackers may become stuck in place, or at least slowed
modifier.tconstruct.springy.description: Attackers may bounce off your armor
modifier.tconstruct.zoom.description: Allows you to see far away objects when interacting while sneaking
modifier.tconstruct.slurping.description: Allows drinking the fluid in a helmet when interacting
modifier.tconstruct.aqua_affinity.descri: Removes the mining penalty from mining underwater
modifier.tconstruct.item_frame.descripti: Adds inventory slots to the helmet for items to observe. Perfect for clocks and compasses
modifier.tconstruct.armor_power.flavor: Can you feel the power flowing through you?
modifier.tconstruct.strength.flavor: Can you feel the strength flowing through you?
modifier.tconstruct.wings.description: Allows you to soar through the air by jumping while in mid air
modifier.tconstruct.speedy.flavor: Keep going and going and going...
modifier.tconstruct.speedy.description: Achieve speeds closer to that of rabbits
modifier.tconstruct.step_up.description: Allows climbing taller blocks as if they were stairs
modifier.tconstruct.leaping.flavor: Leap tall buildings in a single bound!
modifier.tconstruct.leaping.description: Rabbits can leap high, so this should also let you leap high
modifier.tconstruct.pockets.description: The pants have pockets, allowing you to store additional items which can be accessed by shift plus interacting
modifier.tconstruct.shield_strap.flavor: Ideal to protect and to attack
modifier.tconstruct.shield_strap.descrip: Interacting with the leggings allows swapping the offhand item
modifier.tconstruct.tool_belt.descriptio: Interacting with the leggings while holding control allows swapping the hotbar
modifier.tconstruct.soul_belt.descriptio: Items in the hotbar remain in the inventory on death!
modifier.tconstruct.workbench.descriptio: Grants an inventory sized crafting grid in the tool inventory
modifier.tconstruct.crafting_table.flavo: A full table in your pocket!
modifier.tconstruct.crafting_table.descr: Grants a full size crafting grid in the tool's inventory
modifier.tconstruct.inventory_cannot_rem: Making this change would cause an item stored in this tool to be deleted
modifier.tconstruct.long_fall.requiremen: Long Fall requires Feather Falling IV to apply
modifier.tconstruct.soulspeed.descriptio: Increases movement speed on soul sand
modifier.tconstruct.double_jump.descript: Lets you jump again in mid air. Higher levels add even more jumps!
modifier.tconstruct.bouncy.description: Causes the ground to reflect you, as if you are constantly on slime blocks
modifier.tconstruct.frost_walker.descrip: Causes water blocks to temporarily freeze
modifier.tconstruct.snowdrift.descriptio: Leave a trail of snow like a snow golem
modifier.tconstruct.flamewake.descriptio: Leave a trail of fire in your wake
modifier.tconstruct.reflecting.descripti: Allows reflecting projectiles within a short window of deploying your shield
modifier.tconstruct.unbreakable.descript: Tool no longer takes damage from normal usage
modifier.tconstruct.unbreakable.requirem: Unbreakable requires Netherite and Reinforced V to apply
modifier.tconstruct.dual_wielding.descri: Can attack from the offhand, provided the main hand can also dual wield. Tools with dual wielding have reduced stats
modifier.tconstruct.silky.description: Mined blocks drop themselves instead of the usual items
modifier.tconstruct.autosmelt.flavor: Fires of the Nether in your tool!
modifier.tconstruct.luck.description: Gives you more nice things when mining or killing mobs!
modifier.tconstruct.fortune.description: Gives you more nice things when mining!
modifier.tconstruct.looting.description: Gives you more nice things when killing mobs!
modifier.tconstruct.expanded.description: Tool's area of effect is larger than before
modifier.tconstruct.reach.description: Can reach further blocks and mobs while holding this tool!
modifier.tconstruct.pathing.flavor: Where we're going, we need roads!
modifier.tconstruct.stripping.descriptio: Tool can strip bark from wood
modifier.tconstruct.glowing.description: Tool can place glow balls, consuming durability
modifier.tconstruct.exchanging.descripti: Blocks broken by this tool are replaced by the block in the offhand if possible
modifier.tconstruct.firestarter.descript: Tool can create fire on usage
modifier.tconstruct.fireprimer.descripti: Increases the area of fire of the tool
modifier.tconstruct.shears.description: Tool can be used to shear mobs and disarm tripwire
modifier.tconstruct.silky_shears.descrip: Tool can shear mobs if the silky modifier is added
modifier.tconstruct.silky_aoe_shears.des: Tool can shear mobs if the silky modifier is added
modifier.tconstruct.harvest.description: Tool can be used on crops to harvest and replant them
modifier.tconstruct.blocking.description: Interacting with the tool will allow blocking incoming damage
modifier.tconstruct.parrying.description: Briefly block after attacking, allowing for deflection of many attacks
modifier.tconstruct.flinging.description:
Charge up, aim low, and fling away from the targeted block!
Use bouncy if you value your life.
modifier.tconstruct.springing.descriptio: Charge up, aim high, and launch back into the air!
modifier.tconstruct.bonking.description: Charge up, aim at a foe, and bonk them away!
modifier.tconstruct.warping.description: Charge up, aim at a wall, and warp to the other side!
modifier.tconstruct.melting.flavor: The power of a Melter on a stick!
modifier.tconstruct.melting.description: Melts attacked entities and items dropped!
modifier.tconstruct.tank.description: Tool has a fluid tank, allowing it to store fluid
modifier.tconstruct.bucketing.descriptio: Tool can pickup liquid, or place it when crouching
modifier.tconstruct.spilling.description: Fluid contained in the weapon spills onto melee targets causing effects based on the fluid

Itt készíthetsz eszközalkatrészeket, hogy kielégítsd barkácsolási vágyaidat.

Egy alkatrész elkészítéséhez helyezz egy üres mintát a bal oldali slotba, és válaszd ki az alkatrészt, amelyet szeretnél. A maradék slotban a kívánt anyagot kell elhelyezned az alkatrész elkészítéséhez.
Material cannot be shaped in the part builder. Other methods such as casting are required.
